roborally.model
Class Element

java.lang.Object
  roborally.model.Element
Direct Known Subclasses:
Item, Robot, Wall
public abstract class Element
extends Object

The class battery represents an element.

Author:
Ben Adriaenssens (ben.adriaenssens@student.kuleuven.be) - WtkCws, Toon Nolten (toon.nolten@student.kuleuven.be) - CwsElt.
